actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to improve judicial machinery by requiring a minimum $10,000 jurisdiction limit on freight damage actions brought in U.S. District courts.

summary.text: Requires an amount in controversy of $10,000 on freight damage actions brought in U.S. district courts. Provides that if a plaintiff is finally adjudged to be entitled to recover less than such amount, the court may deny costs to such plaintiff and, in addition, may impose cost on him.

titles.title: A bill to improve judicial machinery by requiring a minimum $10,000 jurisdiction limit on freight damage actions brought in U.S. District courts.
